performance-string-view-conversions.description:
Description

Finds and removes redundant conversions from
std::[w|u8|u16|u32]string_view
to
std::[...]string
in call expressions expecting
std::[...]string_view
.

Before:

void
foo
(
int
p1
,
std
::
string_view
p2
,
double
p3
);
void
bar
(
std
::
string_view
sv
)
{
foo
(
42
,
std
::
string
(
sv
),
3.14
);
// conversion to std::string is
// redundant as std::string_view
// is expected
foo
(
42
,
std
::
string
(
"foo"
),
3.14
);
// conversion to std::string is
// redundant as std::string_view
// is expected
}

After:

void
foo
(
int
p1
,
std
::
string_view
p2
,
double
p3
);
void
bar
(
std
::
string_view
sv
)
{
foo
(
42
,
sv
,
3.14
);
foo
(
42
,
"foo"
,
3.14
);
}
performance-string-view-conversions.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
